subject: Soccer

lead_paragraph: Mr. Valcke denied wrongdoing over the payment, which has widely been seen as a bribe to gain support for South Africa’s bid to host the 2010 World Cup.
snippet: Mr. Valcke denied wrongdoing over the payment, which has widely been seen as a bribe to gain support for South Africa’s bid to host the 2010 World Cup.
